affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closesest enemy unit to Mirana in a 325 radius will be struck a second time for 75% of the damage.
notes:
Starstorm is not blocked by Linken's Sphere.
Starstorm cannot hit invisible units.
Starstorm will choose a new target for the second star if the first died before impact.
cmb:
100/120/140/160
12
lore: The Goddess breaks the strata to empower her Princess in the time of need.
name: mirana_starfall

affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Fires an long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from 0.01 to 5 seconds, with bonus damage up to 140 added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target.
notes:
For every 150 distance the arrow travels, the stun duration upon impact increases by 0.5 seconds, and the bonus damage added increases by 14.
Sacred Arrow can hit invisible units.
attrib:
RANGE: 3000
MINIMUM STUN: 0.01
MAXIMUM STUN: 5
MAXIMUM BONUS DAMAGE: 140
cmb:
100/100/100/100
17
lore: Lunar energies make the Princess of the Moon's arrows more deadly than most.
name: mirana_arrow

desc: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering allied units with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts 10 seconds.
notes: You can use Leap to dodge incoming projectiles.
cmb:
40/35/30/20
30/26/22/18
lore: Both friend and foe alike recognize Mirana's iconic white beast in the heat of battle.
name: mirana_leap

desc: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.
notes:
Units affected will not auto attack enemies.
Spell Immune allies will be affected.
cmb:
75
140/120/100
lore: Her tenure with Selemene allows Mirana to eclipse the ground, wrapping her allies in a cloak of shadows.
name: mirana_invis
